thread.title: Chips, not cameras, behind Amazon's purchase of Blink

title: Chips, not cameras, behind Amazon's purchase of Blink
text:
Chips, not cameras, behind Amazon's purchase of Blink 1:19pm GMT - 01:36 
Amazon's takeover of camera maker Blink last year was less about cameras and more about the startup's energy-efficient chip technology and how it could integrate with Amazon's consumer products.   
Amazon's takeover of camera maker Blink last year was less about cameras and more about the startup's energy-efficient chip technology and how it could integrate with Amazon's consumer products.  //reut.rs/2stP0Ta
